channel.title: 508 HD client help?
channel.description:
Hey I'm just wondering, I've been having this error for a while now. It's only HD clients, I can load Runescape perfectly fine on HD.
But every time I run this client it gets stuck on 'loading 3D library'?
[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/rwufc8.jpg[/img]
If I could get some help it'd be appreciated.
My paths -
System variables -
- CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin;%CLASSPATH%; - C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin;;%systemroot%\system32
User variables -
- CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin;%CLASSPATH%; - C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin;

item.title: 508 HD client help?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

The client uses some special libraries for rendering HD, the error is that it can’t find those libraries on the computer, based on the simple way that applets work.

Read full topic

item.title: 508 HD client help?
item.dc:creator: @devenb123 devenb123
item.description:
@devenb123 wrote:

Davidi2:

It’s the DLL’s that come with the client, you need to download and load them from the persons computer.

this happened to me when i tryed to the source about 3 months ago and i dont understand at all what you just said

Read full topic

item.title: 508 HD client help?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

It’s the DLL’s that come with the client, you need to download and load them from the persons computer.

Read full topic

item.title: 508 HD client help?
item.dc:creator: @Tylerd21 Tylerd21
item.description:
@Tylerd21 wrote:

Hey I’m just wondering, I’ve been having this error for a while now.
It’s only HD clients, I can load Runescape perfectly fine on HD.

But every time I run this client it gets stuck on ‘loading 3D library’?

rwufc8.jpg765×506

If I could get some help it’d be appreciated.

My paths -

System variables -

  • CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
  • C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin;;%systemroot%\system32

User variables -

  • CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
  • C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin;

Read full topic
